resources.string: for a radio group, use onCheckedChangedListener to set actions for your radio buttons
For a check box, use onClickListener, which is implemented on a checkbox. both isChecked(true) and !isChecked(false) can both be added
For the spinner, use onItemSelectedListener to select items found inside the spinner as the action listener. DO NOT USE onItemClickLister!!
